meanings.definition: Next to last in a series
meanings.sent1: The penultimately chapter of the book revealed the surprising twist.
meanings.sent2: The penultimately episode of the show left viewers eager for the finale.
meanings.sent3: The penultimately slice of cake mysteriously disappeared before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her penultimately attempt at solving the puzzle finally led to success.
meanings.sent5: The penultimately player in the lineup scored the winning goal.

meanings.definition: Occurring before the last in a sequence
meanings.sent1: The penultimately train arrived just before the last one.
meanings.sent2: The penultimately question in the exam was the trickiest.
meanings.sent3: The penultimately cookie in the jar always seemed to disappear first.
meanings.sent4: His penultimately decision to leave the party early surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The penultimately step in the recipe added a unique flavor to the dish.
